bill.title: Maintenance of the codes.

history.action: From printer. May be heard in committee March 28.
From committee: Do pass. To Consent Calendar. (Ayes 10. Noes 0.) (April 7).
Read second time. Ordered to Consent Calendar.
Read third time. Passed. Ordered to the Senate. (Ayes 79. Noes 0. Page 885.)
In Senate. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment.
From committee chair, with author's amendments: Amend, and re-refer to committee. Read second time, amended, and re-referred to Com. on JUD.
From committee: Do pass. To Consent Calendar. (Ayes 7. Noes 0.) (July 14).
Read second time. Ordered to Consent Calendar.
Read third time. Passed. Ordered to the Assembly. (Ayes 38. Noes 0. Page 2111.).
In Assembly. Concurrence in Senate amendments pending. May be considered on or after August 22 pursuant to Assembly Rule 77.
Senate amendments concurred in. To Engrossing and Enrolling. (Ayes 78. Noes 0. Page 2554.).
Enrolled and presented to the Governor at 4 p.m.
Chaptered by Secretary of State - Chapter 303, Statutes of 2015.

votes.desc: AB 731 GALLAGHER  Consent Calendar Second Day  Regular Session
Do pass and be placed on the Consent Calendar
AB 731 GALLAGHER  Concurrence in Senate Amendments
